text:
"You're the Worst" is an American comedy-drama television series created by Stephen Falk. It was first shown on FX in 2014. From 2015 to 2019 it was shown on FXX.
Synopsis.
The series is about the relationship and lives of Jimmy Shive-Overly and his girlfriend Gretchen Cutler, The series is also about the lives of Jimmy's best friend Edgar Quintero and Gretchen's best friend Lindsay Jillian.
